description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Where to buy at Croydon. An illustrated local review. By the Editor of the “Agents' Guide,” etc", "Appendix" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10368.k.24." Page: 17 Place of Publishing: Brighton Date of Publishing: 1891 Publisher: Robinson, Son & Pike Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000828635 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
